name: gloxinia
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
a plant found in central and south America with large red, purple, or white bell-shaped flowers, that is grown in gardens or in a container inside a house: The house was surrounded by roses, gloxinia, and delphiniums. Gloxinia must be fed and watered regularly as soon as buds begin to develop. Start gloxinias off indoors or under cover, as they need a long growing season.
